class.name: org.gmod.gbol.simpleObject.generated.AbstractCV
class.comment: A controlled vocabulary or ontology. A cv is composed of cvterms (AKA terms, classes, types, universals - relations and properties are also stored in cvterm) and the relationships between them.

column.name: name
column.comment: The name of the ontology. This corresponds to the obo-format -namespace-. cv names uniquely identify the cv. In OBO file format, the cv.name is known as the namespace.

column.name: definition
column.comment: A text description of the criteria for membership of this ontology.

column.name: cv_id
column.comment: The cv or ontology or namespace to which this cvterm belongs.
